sen.j: ミズナ Brassica rapa L. var. nipposinica (L.H.Bailey) Kitam. （水菜、pot herb mustard）は、アブラナ科の一年生植物。
sen.e: Mizuna (potherb mustard)is a yearly plant of Brassicaceae.
Mizuna (potherb mustard)is a yearly plant of Brassicaceae.
Mizuna (potherb mustard)is a yearly plant of Brassicaceae.

sen.j: 京野菜のひとつで葉柄が白く、細長い。
sen.e: It is listed in Kyo-yasai (specifically certified vegetable varieties grown in Kyoto) and has white, narrow and long leafstalk.
It is listed in the Kyo-yasai (specifically certified vegetable varieties grown in Kyoto) and has a white, narrow and long leafstalk.
It is listed in the Kyo-yasai (specifically certified vegetable varieties grown in Kyoto) and has a white, narrow and long leafstalk.

sen.j: 葉には数多くの鋸歯状の切れ込みがある。
sen.e: Its leaves are serrate.
Its leaves are serrated.
Its leaves are serrated.

sen.j: 寒さに強く、緑の少ない冬から早春の野菜として重宝される。
sen.e: It is resistant to cold and excellent as winter to early spring vegetable at the time when less green vegetables are supplied.
It is resistant to cold and is excellent as winter to early spring vegetable at the time when few green vegetables are growing.
It is resistant to cold and is excellent as a winter to early spring vegetable at the time when few green vegetables are growing.
sen.cmt: as の後に不定冠詞を入れました。

sen.j: 別名にキョウナ（京菜）、ヒイラギナ（柊菜）、センスジナ（千筋菜）などがある。
sen.e: It is also called as 'Kyona', 'Hiiragina' or 'Sensujina' (literally, Vegetable of Kyoto, Holly vegetable and Thousand stripes, respectively.)
It is also called as 'Kyona', 'Hiiragina' or 'Sensujina' (literally, Vegetable of Kyoto, Holly vegetable and Thousand stripes, respectively.)
It is also called as 'Kyona', 'Hiiragina' or 'Sensujina' (literally, Vegetable of Kyoto, Holly vegetable and Thousand stripes, respectively.)

sen.j: 臭みの無い淡白な味わいとシャキシャキした歯ざわりが特徴で、和える、鍋料理、サラダ、汁物、煮るなどにひろく用いられる。
sen.e: It is less smelly and is crisp, and widely used for dishes dressed with various kinds of sauce, a one-pot dish cooked at the table, salad, soup and cooked food.
It is less smelly and is crisp, and widely used for dishes dressed with various kinds of sauces, a one-pot dish cooked at the table, salad, soup, and cooked food.
It is less smelly and is crisp, and widely used for dishes dressed with various kinds of sauces, a one-pot dish cooked at the table, salad, soup, and cooked food.

sen.j: 含まれる栄養素はベータカロチン、ビタミンA、ビタミンC、ビタミンE、カルシウム、鉄分。
sen.e: It is rich with nutritions such as beta-carotene, vitamin A, C and E, calcium and iron.
It is rich with nutritions such as beta-carotene, vitamin A, C and E, calcium and iron.
It is rich with nutritions such as beta-carotene, vitamin A, C and E, calcium and iron.
